text: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
author: John F. Kennedy

text: The measure of intelligence is the ability to change.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

text: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future by merely changing his attitude.
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: Change is inevitable. Growth is optional.
author: John C. Maxwell

text: You must be the change you wish to see in your world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading.
author: Lao Tzu

text: It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
author: Charles Darwin

text: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
author: Winston S. Churchill

text: Every success story is a tale of constant adaptation, revision, and change.
author: Richard Branson

text: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don’t resist them; that only creates sorrow.
author: Lao Tzu

text: Change your life today. Don’t gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

text: The only thing that is constant is change.
author: Heraclitus

text: Change is hard at first, messy in the middle, and gorgeous at the end.
author: Robin Sharma
